member.name: T:DaLion.Combat.CombatApi
member.summary: The API implementation.

member.name: T:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig
member.summary: Config schema for the Combat mod.

member.name: T:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig.FaceCursorCondition
member.summary: The texture that should be used as the resonance light source.

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig.FaceCursorCondition.Never
member.summary: Never face the mouse cursor when using a tool.

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig.FaceCursorCondition.WeaponOnly
member.summary: Face the mouse cursor when the current tool is a or .

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig.FaceCursorCondition.Always
member.summary: Face the mouse cursor when using any tool.

member.name: P:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig.EnableComboHits
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to replace vanilla weapon spam with a more strategic combo system.

member.name: P:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig.ComboHitsPerWeaponType
member.summary: Gets the number of hits in each weapon type's combo.

member.name: P:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig.SwipeHold
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to keep swiping while the "use tool" key is held.

member.name: P:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig.GeometricMitigationFormula
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to replace the linear damage mitigation formula with a rational formula that gives more impactful but diminishing returns from the defense stat.

member.name: P:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig.DefenseImprovesParry
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether defense should improve parry damage.

member.name: P:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig.CritsIgnoreDefense
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether critical strikes should ignore the target's defense.

member.name: P:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig.CriticalBackAttacks
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether back attacks gain double crit. chance.

member.name: P:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig.KnockbackHurts
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to add collision damage when knocked-back enemies hit a wall or obstacle.

member.name: P:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig.SlickMoves
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to allow drifting in the movement direction when swinging weapons.

member.name: P:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig.FaceMouseCursor
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether face the current cursor position before using a tool.

member.name: P:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig.VariedEncounters
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether randomizes monster stats to add variability to monster encounters.

member.name: P:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig.MonsterSpawnChanceMultiplier
member.summary: Gets a multiplier which allows increasing the spawn chance of monsters in dungeons.

member.name: P:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig.MonsterHealthMultiplier
member.summary: Gets a multiplier which allows scaling the health of all monsters.

member.name: P:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig.MonsterDamageMultiplier
member.summary: Gets a multiplier which allows scaling the damage dealt by all monsters.

member.name: P:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig.MonsterDefenseMultiplier
member.summary: Gets a multiplier which allows scaling the resistance of all monsters.

member.name: P:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig.MonsterHealthSummand
member.summary: Gets a summand which is added to the resistance of all monsters (before the multiplier).

member.name: P:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig.MonsterDamageSummand
member.summary: Gets a summand which is added to the resistance of all monsters (before the multiplier).

member.name: P:DaLion.Combat.CombatConfig.MonsterDefenseSummand
member.summary: Gets a summand which is added to the resistance of all monsters (before the multiplier).

member.name: T:DaLion.Combat.I18n
member.summary: Get translations from the mod's i18n folder.
member.remarks: This is auto-generated from the i18n/default.json file when the project is compiled.

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Translations
member.summary: The mod's translation helper.

member.name: T:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys
member.summary: A lookup of available translation keys.

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_Sections_Cmbt_Combo
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Combo Framework".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_EnableComboHits_Title
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Enable Melee Combo Hits".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_EnableComboHits_Desc
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Replaces vanilla weapon spam with a more strategic combo system.".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_ComboHitsPerWeaponType_DefenseSword_Title
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Sword Combo Hits".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_ComboHitsPerWeaponType_DefenseSword_Desc
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "The max. number of consecutive hits in a Sword combo.".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_ComboHitsPerWeaponType_Club_Title
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Club Combo Hits".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_ComboHitsPerWeaponType_Club_Desc
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "The max. number of consecutive hits in a Club combo.".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_SwipeHold_Title
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Enable Hold-To-Swipe".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_SwipeHold_Desc
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Allows performing combos by simply holding the tool button instead of spam-clicking.".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_Sections_Cmbt_Stats
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Character Stats".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_GeometricMitigationFormula_Title
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Use Geometric Mitigation Formula".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_GeometricMitigationFormula_Desc
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Replaces the linear damage mitigation formula with a rational formula that gives more impactful but diminishing returns from the defense stat. BEFORE: Damage -= Defense; AFTER: Damage *= 0.9 ^ Defense".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_DefenseImprovesParry_Title
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Defense Improves Parry Damage".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_DefenseImprovesParry_Desc
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Parry damage (sword special move) is increased by the defense stat.".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_CritsIgnoreDefense_Title
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Crits. Ignore Defense".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_CritsIgnoreDefense_Desc
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Critical strikes ignore the target's defense stat.".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_CriticalBackAttacks_Title
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Critical Back Attacks".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_CriticalBackAttacks_Desc
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Hits to an enemy's backside have double critical strike chance.".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_KnockbackHurts_Title
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Knockbacks Hurt".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_KnockbackHurts_Desc
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Adds collision damage when knocked-back enemies collide with a wall or obstacle.".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_Sections_Cmbt_Controls
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Controls".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_SlickMoves_Title
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Slick Moves".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_SlickMoves_Desc
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Drift in the current running direction when attacking.".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_FaceMouseCursor_Title
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Face Towards Mouse Cursor".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_FaceMouseCursor_Desc
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "If using mouse and keyboard, turn to face towards the current cursor position when using a tool.".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_FaceCursorCondition_Never
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Never".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_FaceCursorCondition_WeaponOnly
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Weapon Only".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_FaceCursorCondition_Always
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "All Tools".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_Sections_Cmbt_Enemies
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Enemies".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_VariedEncounters_Title
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Varied Encounters".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_VariedEncounters_Desc
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Randomizes monster stats, subject to Daily Luck bias, adding variability to monster encounters.".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_MonsterSpawnChanceMultiplier_Title
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Spawn Chance Multiplier".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_MonsterSpawnChanceMultiplier_Desc
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Multiplies the chance to spawn enemies in dungeons.".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_MonsterHealthMultiplier_Title
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Health Multiplier".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_MonsterHealthMultiplier_Desc
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Multiplies the health of all enemies.".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_MonsterDamageMultiplier_Title

member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Multiplies the damage dealt by all enemies.".

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_MonsterDefenseMultiplier_Title

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_MonsterDefenseMultiplier_Desc

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_MonsterHealthSummand_Title

member.name: F:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_MonsterHealthSummand_Desc
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Adds to the health of all enemies (before multiplier).".

member.name: M:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Gmcm_EnableComboHits_Title

member.name: M:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Gmcm_EnableComboHits_Desc
member.summary: Get a translation equivalent to "Replaces vanilla weapon spam with a more strategic combo system.".

member.name: M:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Gmcm_ComboHitsPerWeaponType_DefenseSword_Title
member.summary: Get a translation equivalent to "Sword Combo Hits".

member.name: M:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Gmcm_ComboHitsPerWeaponType_DefenseSword_Desc
member.summary: Get a translation equivalent to "The max. number of consecutive hits in a Sword combo.".

member.name: M:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Gmcm_ComboHitsPerWeaponType_Club_Title
member.summary: Get a translation equivalent to "Club Combo Hits".

member.name: M:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Gmcm_ComboHitsPerWeaponType_Club_Desc
member.summary: Get a translation equivalent to "The max. number of consecutive hits in a Club combo.".

member.name: M:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Gmcm_SwipeHold_Title
member.summary: Get a translation equivalent to "Enable Hold-To-Swipe".

member.name: M:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Gmcm_SwipeHold_Desc
member.summary: Get a translation equivalent to "Allows performing combos by simply holding the tool button instead of spam-clicking.".

member.name: M:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Gmcm_Sections_Cmbt_Stats
member.summary: Get a translation equivalent to "Character Stats".

member.name: M:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Gmcm_GeometricMitigationFormula_Title
member.summary: Get a translation equivalent to "Use Geometric Mitigation Formula".

member.name: M:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Gmcm_GeometricMitigationFormula_Desc
member.summary: Get a translation equivalent to "Replaces the linear damage mitigation formula with a rational formula that gives more impactful but diminishing returns from the defense stat. BEFORE: Damage -= Defense; AFTER: Damage *= 0.9 ^ Defense".

member.name: M:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Gmcm_DefenseImprovesParry_Title
member.summary: Get a translation equivalent to "Defense Improves Parry Damage".

member.name: M:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Gmcm_DefenseImprovesParry_Desc
member.summary: Get a translation equivalent to "Parry damage (sword special move) is increased by the defense stat.".

member.name: M:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Gmcm_CritsIgnoreDefense_Title
member.summary: Get a translation equivalent to "Crits. Ignore Defense".

member.name: M:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Gmcm_CritsIgnoreDefense_Desc
member.summary: Get a translation equivalent to "Critical strikes ignore the target's defense stat.".

member.name: M:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Gmcm_CriticalBackAttacks_Title
member.summary: Get a translation equivalent to "Critical Back Attacks".

member.name: M:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Gmcm_CriticalBackAttacks_Desc
member.summary: Get a translation equivalent to "Hits to an enemy's backside have double critical strike chance.".

member.name: M:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Gmcm_KnockbackHurts_Title

member.name: M:DaLion.Combat.I18n.Gmcm_KnockbackHurts_Desc
member.summary: Get a translation equivalent to "Adds collision damage when knocked-back enemies collide with a wall or obstacle.".

member.name: M:DaLion.Combat.I18n.GetByKey(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Get a translation by its key.
member.param: The translation key.
An object containing token key/value pairs. This can be an anonymous object (like new { value = 42, name = "Cranberries" }), a dictionary, or a class instance.
member.remarks: You should usually use a strongly-typed method like instead.

member.name: T:NetEscapades.EnumGenerators.EnumExtensionsAttribute
member.summary: Add to enums to indicate that extension methods should be generated for the type

member.name: P:NetEscapades.EnumGenerators.EnumExtensionsAttribute.ExtensionClassNamespace
member.summary: The namespace to generate the extension class. If not provided the namespace of the enum will be used

member.name: P:NetEscapades.EnumGenerators.EnumExtensionsAttribute.ExtensionClassName
member.summary: The name to use for the extension class. If not provided, the enum name with "Extensions" will be used. For example for an Enum called StatusCodes, the default name will be StatusCodesExtensions
